participant_1.background:
I like to watch my dolphins swimming in the ocean.
I was a musician before my current job.
i enjoy horseback riding.
i am a full time mom.
i enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee.

participant_2.background:
I have had a history of anxiety and depression, but I am managing it well with therapy and medication.
I eat a slice of my favorite pizza to cheer up.
i like to do my nails.
I have an interest in fashion and try to wear nice clothes every day.
I'm a single man who enjoys driving my SUV and eating jello.

content.text: Hey there, how was your day?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. I've had a lot of anxiety lately, but I'm managing it well with therapy and medication.
That's great to hear. I'm sorry to hear you've been struggling with anxiety, but I'm glad you're taking care of yourself.
Thank you. It's been a journey, but I'm finally on the right track.
That's great to hear. I hope you're able to continue on the right track and find happiness.
Thanks, me too. I'm trying my best.
I admire that. I'm sure you'll be able to achieve your goals.
Thank you, I appreciate that.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to do my nails, I have an interest in fashion and try to wear nice clothes every day. I also like to drive my SUV and eat jello.
That's interesting. I've never been much of a nail person, but I do like fashion and driving. I've never tried jello, though.
You should try it! It's delicious.
I might just do that. Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome.
So, what are you looking for in a friend?
I'm looking for someone who is kind, compassionate, and understanding. I also want someone who is fun to be around and who shares my interests.
I think we could be good friends. I'm kind, compassionate, and understanding. I'm also fun to be around and I love fashion and driving.
I think you're right. We could be good friends.
Great! I'm glad to hear that.
Me too.
So, what do you want to do for our first hangout?
I'm not sure. What do you want to do?
We could go shopping, get coffee, or see a movie.
Those all sound good. I'm up for whatever.
Okay, let's go shopping. I need some new clothes.
Great! I love shopping.
Me too.
So, what are we waiting for? Let's go!
